channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Vehicles being driven over/parked on grass verge, 8th December
item.description:
32 Surrey Avenue cheltenham. Cars being driven over kerbs, parking on grass verge. Mud all over pavements, cracked slabs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Surrey Avenue, Rowanfield, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Street light 15 not working, 8th December
item.description:
I reported this street light months ago and as you can see from the photos I had a response today to say it’s fixed but I’ve driven past this evening and it’s not working. Street light 15 on the roundabout on Gotherington Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
